text: (antima vicaraneya) a dina, pratiyobbanu tanu madiruva pratiyondu satkarmavannu hagu tanu madiruva pratiyondu duskarmavannu tanna munde kanuvanu. Aga avanu, tanna hagu avugala (a tanna papagala) naduve bhari antaravirabekittu endu hambalisuvanu. Allahanu tanna kuritu nim'mannu eccarisuttane. Allahanu tanna dasara palige tumba vatsalyamayiyagiddane
